attributes.action: acknowledge that the paying back of public funds (money) by MP’s is an admission of guilt and that he ensures that the due course of law ensues in each case. That is the guilty are prosecuted and duly punished!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
